home.title: Prima Dentist
home.text: The place where you can lay back!

introduction.title: PRIMA DENTIST AND DENTAL OFFICE
introduction.text: Our team of experienced, highly qualified dentists is waiting for you in our dental office in Szeged, next to the park. Our dental clinic offers comprehensive dental care: in addition to general and aesthetic dental treatments, orthodontics and oral surgery (implantation, wisdom tooth removal) are also available. Dental treatments are performed using only premium dental materials and the most modern dental equipment possible. It is true for all members of the team of our dental office that for us, providing dental care is not just a job, but also a profession. Our goal is for all our patients to leave us satisfied and with a confident smile. A Dentistry in Szeged, where your problem is fixed quickly, painlessly and to a high professional standard.

item1.title: Dental Retaining Treatment
item1.text: During our tooth-retaining treatments, we do everything in addition to eliminating pain so that you can use your teeth for many years to come without any problems.

item2.title: Dentures
item2.text: With dental restorations - be it bridges, crowns, removable dentures or implants - we restore your self-confidence and, last but not least, your ability to chew.

item3.title: Aesthetic intervention
item3.text: We not only whiten healthy teeth, but we also whiten root-treated teeth, and we also put on dental jewelry chosen by the patient with medical expertise.

item1.title: Evidence-based dentistry
item1.text: Dental care cannot be based solely on the dentist's individual experience, but continuous learning and up-to-date knowledge of the latest dental research available are essential.

item2.title: Full information
item2.text: We prepare a complex treatment plan based on x-rays and - if necessary - photos of the face and oral cavity, as well as impressions, and provide comprehensive, detailed information on the course and price of possible dental treatments.

item3.title: Evidence-based dentistry
item3.text: Dental care cannot be based solely on the dentist's individual experience, but continuous learning and up-to-date knowledge of the latest dental research available are essential.
